about_the_game:
This fabulous city lies in the middle of the desert, in a rare ring of palm trees. To its entrance, a long straight road leads through the dunes. The town consists of 3 parts: The poor quarter with its streets dirty, its walls rotting and weathered, is the market's home. The Garden Quarter, where vibrant green plants surround the roads and the walls. The palace district, whose white walls reflect light blindly and show no more of its richness than the roads leading over a blue-green pool full of water.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

The palace district, whose white walls reflect light blindly and show no more of its richness than the roads leading over a blue-green pool full of water.

name: RPGScenery - Arabian Streets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
